message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know you understand time is money.
Come on, Alice! I'm being generous considering the inflation!
The inflation is hitting us both, Bob.  Let's be realistic and close this deal.
You know the money is losing value for you, Alice. I'm being reasonable here.
This is cutting it close, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats up any more of the pie.
Inflation is really taking a toll on your share, Alice. This is a good deal for you at this point.
